short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calls attention to the assets owned by large corporations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This item will swap out logos on websites owned by Amazon with the Amazon logo. This will allow users increased visibility into what large corporations can influence.
